name: Planet Defender (itch) (JenniferMoravits)
description:
Made in a week, Planet Defender is a first person planet defense game where the player just tries to get their highest score. However instead of being a shooter, the player must use momentum in order to propel their ship into the enemy ships to destroy them.

The planet the player defends simulates an orbital slingshot and the player will both accelerate and decelerate faster when flying over the planet.
